name: Checkr
description: Automated background screenings and driving records. Run background checks automatically and securely with our RESTful API. Checkr’s color-coded dashboard makes it easy to browse and evaluate background reports that include national and county criminal records, driving history, SSN verification, previous addresses and more. Our simple and robust API lets you integrate in minutes. We provide a clean documentation and powerful developer tools. Receive real-time results in your application via webhooks.
